BattlenetPort._comment: Description: TCP port to reach the auth server for battle.net connections.
BindIP._comment: Description: Bind auth server to IP/hostname
Default:     0.0.0.0 - (Bind to all IPs on the system)
RealmsStateUpdateDelay._comment: Description: Time (in seconds) between realm list updates.
BanExpiryCheckInterval._comment: Description: Time (in seconds) between checks for expired bans
AllowLoggingIPAddressesInDatabase._comme: Description: Specifies if IP addresses can be logged to the database
DBQueryWorkerInterval._comment: Description: Time (milliseconds) for Query Task Worker interval.
MySQLExecutable._comment: Description: The path to your MySQL CLI binary.
If the path is left empty, built-in path from cmake is used.
LogsDir._comment: Important:   LogsDir needs to be quoted, as the string might contain space characters.
Logs directory must exists, or log file creation will be disabled.
Default:     Logs - (Log files will be stored in the current path)
MaxNumberLogRotations._comment: Description: Number of logs to keep in rotation. A new log is rotated in at every server startup.  ex: WorldServer.1.log
MaxLogSize._comment: Description: Max Size of a log file in MB before its rotated.
